channel.title: Dialog Options
channel.description: Ok what I'm trying to do is make the dialog options work, I am currently using a Pi source (Project Insanity) Ok so I am just stuck with the whole thing, I've added the options to the dialog handler.java. I need help with getting the options configured with clicking buttons.java, I have no idea how to do this so please help >.>.
